title: "Happy Passover, Happy Easter": Trump
text:
"Happy Passover, Happy Easter": Trump Saturday, March 31, 2018 - 01:18 
In his weekly address, President Donald Trump recognized two religious holidays this weekend - Christian holiday Easter and the Jewish holiday Passover. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In his weekly address, President Donald Trump recognized two religious holidays this weekend - Christian holiday Easter and the Jewish holiday Passover. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
